summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Interview Prep Platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with 2 UI issues identified: difficulty filter dropdown overlay problem and Goldmine page routing issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown items not clickable due to overlay interception
ui_bugs.details: Users can open the difficulty filter dropdown but cannot select options like 'Easy', 'Medium', 'Hard' due to HTML element overlay issues

ui_bugs.issue: Goldmine page redirects to homepage instead of showing premium content
ui_bugs.details: When accessing /goldmine URL, page shows homepage content instead of premium upgrade screen or company list

passed_tests: Redis caching for topics and companies
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix difficulty filter dropdown overlay issue on homepage and resolve Goldmine page routing problem. Both are preventing users from accessing key functionality.
